授業目的: In intensive reading, students will improve basic reading comprehension skills by understanding a main idea, the structure of an article. Vocabulary building by learning words and phrases as used in textbooks. Fluency reading by reading Graded Readers Books.
到達目標: Students will learn how the article is organised by understanding how the paragraphs are related to one another. They will also learn what is a main idea in each article.
